text: Category:Punjabi tribes Category:Social groups of Pakistan Haraj () is a Punjabi tribe in Pakistan. It is a subcaste of Sial(Jutt). specially a big caste of District (Khanewal) and also evolved in politics. Sardar Ahmad Yar Haraj is xMNA From district Khanewal and his brother Sardar Hamid Yar haraj is present MPA from district Khanewal. Raza hayat Haraj is xMNA from Khanewal and also was the federal minister during the last Govt. Official language is (jhangvi) Punjabi and Saraki.
title: Hiraj
